attributes.action: create a US green card system for the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK immigration system seems too easy when compared to the likes of the USA and Australia.  We request that the UK implement a green card system similar to the USA with 'Labour Certification' such that it is easier to identify immigrants that are permitted to work and that the work a immigrant under took in the UK could not be performed by a British Citizen due to a lack of suitable qualified candidates.
